mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.table_source_field, a.dimension_field_cn_name, a.dimension_field_type, a.dimension_field_length, a.dimension_field_des, a.dimension_field_en_name, a.attribute_type, a.table_source, b.dimension_cn_name from tb_dimension_attribute a left join tb_dimension b on a.associate_dimension_id = b.id where a.del_flag=1 and a.dimension_id= ${dimensionId} order by a.create_time desc
